Title: Establishes do not resuscitate orders on drivers' licenses and identification cards
Summary: Establishes do not resuscitate orders on drivers' licenses and identification cards.
LawCode: Amd §§2994-bb, 2994-cc & 2994-ee, Pub Health L; amd §§490, 502 & 504, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing do not resuscitate orders on drivers' licenses and identification cards
